post.author: 임정숙
post.content:
저희 회사 친구가 적극 추천하는 생굴파는 곳입니다.  
저같이 굴좋아하시는 분들 가서 한번 드셔보세요.  저도 근시일안에 한번 가려합니다.   ㅋㅋㅋ


872 Queen W Toronto, ON M6J1G3  
Phone:   (416) 534-3432
--------------------
Restaurant Profile

Fusion hot spots beware. Mediterranean mainstays move over. Gourmet pizzerias step aside. In a city inundated with wannabe bistros, noodle houses and trattorias, could our collective appetite for restaurants that look closer to home for inspiration be worthy of a trend?

That's what Oyster Boy is hoping, the latest new hot spot to appear on Queen West's new restaurant row. But don't expect to find any Black Angus beef or provimi veal on this menu. Instead, rejoice in the selection of pure unadulterated seafood from the rainy shores of the true north, strong and free.
-------
Dinner for two: $50
Reservations: Not accepted
post.title: Oyster Boy
